job description:
As a member of the machine learning team, your primary responsibility will be the development, evaluation, and application of the cutting edge solutions to real-world challenges. We pride ourselves on a dynamic, flat, "can-do" environment and are looking for those unique individuals who thrive in that dynamic.

Job Qualifications
  • Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
  • Mastery of Python and/or Java.
  • Ability to design, implement, and document scalable code.
  • Driven, self-directed personality. Our team is composed of individuals who consistently demonstrate the ability to self-orient to challenges and solve them.
  • Deep understanding and intuition around machine learning techniques, statistical, and predictive modelling. Experience with direct application to computer vision, particularly object recognition and interaction tagging is a plus.
  • Advanced (MS or PhD) degrees in computer vision, statistics, machine learning, or related quantitative disciplines are a plus. - provided by Dice
Python, Data Science, Machine Learning, Full Stack Engineer
